attributes.action: Prevent implementation of Driver CPC (EU Directive)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I & millions of hard working individuals in Britain have passed thier Driving Tests to qualify to drive Lorries & Buses.

A new EU Directive has been introduced requiring all new & current licence holders to take further annual training to maintain their qualification / right to drive in thier vehicle catergories.

This is going to add a minimum of £2000 per year to My Company Overheads (and this based on only 4 drivers in my business). How dare EU Commissioners / politicians dictate to us what we can & cant drive on our Roads.

I guess this will take a few people off the dole queues to become CPC Trainers, but even more people will join the dole queues through Companies going under due to yet more overheads.

Is this really going to be implemented Europe Wide ?

If this is in the name of "Health & Safety", why dont the 26 million car drivers in this Country do the same annual training ? 

Somthing to do with Votes perhaps  & alot of them .....?

Come on fellow Britains ! Lets finally show the Eurocrats that We are fed up with thier continuous Red Tape & Regulations.
